p: Storage lasted for 4 months, meanwhile, tuber samples were withdrawn, regularly, at one-month intervals, to follow up the changes under the proposed storage conditions. The disease index of blue mold (tuber rot severity, %) was measured based on the previously mentioned scale [ 9]. The tubers were further assessed for defense-related enzymes, i.e., peroxidase and polyphenol oxidase [ 26], and total phenols [ 27]. The tubers were analyzed for inulin [ 28], total carbohydrate [ 29], and protein [ 30] contents. The percentage of sprouting, weight losses, and dry matter of tubers were also measured.
